body:
A bunch of pages in Japanese, then vatches of ~7 bathhouse pages in japanese with random badly colorized pages followed by those same pages in questionably translated english, then sometimes there'll be pages with no text, then finally some new content in japanese and then english.

Still a clusterfuck of an upload.

Are you guys actually retarded? the first ~90 pages aren’t translated. it’s not “Japanese first, then English”, it’s “90 pages of untranslated Japanese tagged as English, and then extra content that’s *actually* Japanese, then English”.
@sinohn You are brain dead already, watched too much porn did this with you.Poor man
for those who complain about the translation, you have it first in Japanese and then in English
@sinohn because the manga is still fully translated retard, only half the pages are jp
why is it tagged English if it's only Japanese
